content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo Wang, I'm glad we're on the same page about the rental price. I'm looking to rent out my apartment for the highest price possible. Let's negotiate a price that suits both of us.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I can offer you a price of 1000 Euros per month. This is a fair price for an apartment of this size and location in Duisburg.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I don't think 1000 Euros is fair. I'm looking for a higher price. Let's negotiate further.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content:
I understand your concern. How about 1100 Euros per month? This is a great price for an apartment of this quality. 

[yourname], if you don't want to continue the negotiation, please let me know. If we reach an agreement, please respond with 'I agree to the price of [x] Euro!', where x is the final price that you want to agree with. If we do not reach an agreement, please respond with 'TERMINATE'.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China
